Title: Enacts the New York state good guardianship act
Summary: Enacts the New York state good guardianship act to establish the statewide initiative of not-for-profit guardians.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the statewide initiative of not-for-profit guardians
